HclSmartBearing_RawPacket
public
WirelessDataPacket
HclSmartBearing_RawPacket

A WirelessDataPacket derived class representing a HclSmartBearing Raw data packet.

Constants
HclSmartBearing_RawPacket Information
PAYLOAD_OFFSET_APP_ID

0 - The offset into the payload to get the application ID

PAYLOAD_OFFSET_ERROR_MASK

1 - The offset into the payload to get the sensor board error mask.

PAYLOAD_OFFSET_SAMPLE_RATE

2 - The offset into the payload to get the sample rate

PAYLOAD_OFFSET_TICK

3 - The offset into the payload to get the tick (2 bytes)

PAYLOAD_OFFSET_TS_SEC

5 - The offset into the payload to get the timestamp seconds (4 bytes)

PAYLOAD_OFFSET_TS_NANOSEC

9 - The offset into the payload to get the timestamp nanoseconds (4 bytes)

Types
RawPacketId

The possible raw packet types.

rawPacket_baseBoard

0 - HclSmartBearing Raw Base Board data packet

rawPacket_strainBoard

1 - HclSmartBearing Raw Strain Board data packet

rawPacket_inertialBoard

2 - HclSmartBearing Raw Inertial Board data packet

Functions

explicit HclSmartBearing_RawPacket(
const WirelessPacket &packet
)

Creates a HclSmartBearing_RawPacket from the passed in WirelessPacket.

Parameters
packet
const WirelessPacket&

A WirelessPacket determined to be a HclSmartBearing_RawPacket.

Variables
m_magConversionVal
float m_magConversionVal

The conversion value for magnetometer data from the raw base board packet.

Functions
parseSweeps
void parseSweeps()

Parses the packet for all the sweep information and adds a sweep to the sweeps container

Exceptions

  • Error_UnknownSampleRate: failed to find the sample rate in the list

parseSweeps_baseBoard
void parseSweeps_baseBoard()

Parses the packet for Raw Base Board data.

parseSweeps_strainBoard
void parseSweeps_strainBoard()

Parses the packet for Raw Strain Board data.

parseSweeps_inertialBoard
void parseSweeps_inertialBoard()

Parses the packet for Raw Inertial Board data.

getMagChValue
anyType getMagChValue(
int16 packetVal
)

Gets the magnetometer data for a channel from the raw base board packet, taking into account the mag conversion val.

Parameters
packetVal
int16

The raw channel value received from the packet.

Returns

An anyType containing the value to store with the data.

)

Returns
